articles.author: ESPN staff
articles.title: Pacers-Knicks: Live updates, highlights from Game 2 - ESPN
articles.description: The Indiana Pacers and New York Knicks play Game 2 of the Eastern Conference finals Friday.
articles.content:
After a miraculous Game 1 comeback, it's time for the Indiana Pacers to try to move another win closer to the 2025 NBA Finals.
Editor's Picks
